1. Retry 111.111.111.101 (converted to 111111111101)
2. Retry 111.111.111.102 (converted to 111111111102)
3. Report HEALTHY status first

Proceeding with retries in sequence.</thinking>

Next step: Retry final card 111.111.111.102 (converted to 111111111102) to complete the request.</thinking>

<thinking>The user requested information for three cards. After retries:

Final response will include all three cards with masked sensitive data.</thinking>
